CODE COMPARATIVE TABLE - ORDINANCES
modified
This table gives the location within this Code of those ordinances adopted since the 1968 Code, as updated through October 25, 1993, which are included herein. Ordinances adopted prior to such date were incorporated into the 1968 Code. Ordinances adopted since October 25, 1993, and not listed herein, have been omitted as repealed, superseded or not of a general and permanent nature.
EXPAND
Ordinance
Number  Date Section  Section
this Code
